task: Develop a basic 'Mahjong' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Remember those quiet evenings'.
name: Evening Tranquility Mahjong

branding_data.short_description: A calming Mahjong game inspired by peaceful evenings.
branding_data.detailed_description: Evening Tranquility Mahjong offers a serene twist on the classic tile-matching game. Set against a backdrop of gentle sunsets and soothing music, players are invited to unwind and enjoy a relaxing gaming experience. The game captures the essence of quiet evenings, encouraging mindfulness and relaxation while engaging in strategic tile matching. With beautifully designed tiles and tranquil environments, players can immerse themselves in the calming atmosphere as they clear the board and achieve inner peace.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
